org.mmbase.notifications

Class Notifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mmbase.util.functions.FunctionProvider
      • org.mmbase.util.functions.DescribedFunctionProvider
        • org.mmbase.module.Module
          • org.mmbase.module.ReloadableModule
            • org.mmbase.module.WatchedReloadableModule
              • org.mmbase.notifications.Notifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, Descriptor, EventListener, NodeEventListener, RelationEventListener

    public class Notifier
extends WatchedReloadableModule
implements NodeEventListener, RelationEventListener, Runnable
    This class maintains all notifyables and takes care of the actual submission of all notifications.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Michiel Meeuwissen

      • init

        public void init()
        Description copied from class: Module
        Initializes the module. Init must be overridden to read the environment variables it needs.
        This method is called by Module.startModule(), which makes sure it is not called more than once. You should not call init() directly, call startModule() instead.
        Overrides:
        init in class Module
